name: Wand of Fortune Portable
overview: Lulu is a student of a magic school, but is actually a trouble student. Because of her poor magic skills and continual troubles, she was forced to transfer to a different school. She happily joined the new school, but soon discovered a shocking fact... She doesn't have an attribute as a magical girl! If she can't find her attribute before she graduates, her magic power will need to be sealed... Well, will she be able to find it...?
